name: Chibi Heroes Hitter on Galaxy Star Lite Game
name_original: Chibi Heroes Hitter on Galaxy Star Lite Game
description:
Fantastic 2D jumping & hitter game in Chibi Star style! Let's free to unlock our companions!!!! Let Make Chibi Star Hero to destroy all of you enemy and discover all WORLD BOSSSS!!!
## FEATURES ##
- Jumping Skill Level to make High score
- Simply press the play tackles jump or step on the head to kill the monster.
- More than 200+ monsters & 10 bosses to hunt.
- Challenge your ability to survive as much as longer.
- The fantastic 10 exotic scenes & background.
- Unlock all your favorite heroes.
